potion.name: potion
potion.description: Dorse protection potion. Wears off when greeter-bot cycles.

respec.name: respec
respec.description: Clears and returns all used skillpoints.

battleaxe.name: battleaxe
battleaxe.upgrade: Berserker's rage: Deal additional 1.2/1.4/1.6% dmg per 1% HP missing!

bow.name: bow
bow.upgrade: Quickdraw: 7/14/21% chance to fire an extra shot!

daggers.name: daggers
daggers.description: Dmg: 1-15.  Twin daggers hit twice per turn!
daggers.upgrade: Poisoned blades: 12.5% chance poison enemy, dealing 5% max HP each turn, stacking 1/2/3 times!

fists.name: fists
fists.description: Dmg: 1-30.  Basic weapon for all users.
fists.upgrade: Sucker punch: At the start of the match, hit for 80/100/120% dmg!

kamehameha.name: kamehameha
kamehameha.description: Sits around for 6 episodes before unleashing a devastating attack!
kamehameha.win: :w triumphs over :l, but is this the end of their conflict? Find out next time...
kamehameha.upgrade: Survivability: Start with 10/20 bonus HP. Rank 3: becomes a shield that must be popped before taking hits!

scythe.name: scythe
scythe.upgrade: Lifesteal: Heal for 8/16/24% of dmg dealt!

warhammer.name: warhammer
warhammer.description: Dmg: 10-55. Very slow; only hits every other turn. Can 2-shot!
warhammer.upgrade: Focus: Increase base dmg low rolls by 3/6/9!

fiddle.name: fiddle
fiddle.win: He told you once, you son of a bitch, :w is the best that's ever been!
